{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DAP-1513 |revision=A1 |upc= |ean= |asin=B004SUO2ZM |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/22/2011 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Cameo |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=bridge |fcc_id=KA2AP1513A1 |ic_id=4216A-AP1513A1 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9825G6JH-6 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192DR |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.50 |default_user=Admin |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''Wireless N Dual Band MediaBridge''
[http://www.dlink.com/us/en/support/product/dap-1513-wireless-n-dual-band-media-bridge Support page (USA)]
[http://ftp.dlink.ru/pub/Wireless/DAP-1513/ Downloads on the Russian '''D-Link''' FTP server] Per the FCC photos... *This device is OEM '''Cameo'''. *The RAM appears to be a 32 MB '''Winbond''' W9825G6JH-6. [http://ftp.dlink.ru/pub/Wireless/DAP-1513/Firmware/1.01/DAP-1513_A1_FW%20V1.01b05_release%20note_20110705.pdf This device is using RTL8196C]. It is presumed to be using RTL8192DR for the Wi-Fi radio. {{WiFiCert|WFA11159|04/01/2011}}
